DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to choose the preferred treatment modality for solitary, small hepatocellular carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study of Operation and PEIT for Small, Solitary Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)
DOC.detailed_description: To compare the below things between operation group and percutaneous ethanol injection therapy (PEIT) group: 1. Survival - 5 year overall survival rate - Disease free survival rate 2. Recurrence - Cumulative recurrence rate
